DE4A5B504766D644FB6F1E928BE261AF: An indestructible chest that can be locked and unlocked dynamically.
D09F72BF4232B5CAA6B701B5CFD0F53E: Chests and containers which drop randomized loot.
D3B5C05249A624EB641F5C9EEA032179: Chests and containers which drop randomized loot.
7200B2DB4228FD86B7CF7B8669270673: You cannot open this right now.

UserOptionDefinition.Device_HeroChest_C.LockedSublabel.Descri: Additional text shown when interacting while the chest is locked.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_HeroChest_C.Reset.Description: Close the chest, refresh its loot, and set the chest to its default locked state for everyone. The default locked state is initialized by Start Locked and overridden by Lock For All Players and Unlock For All Players.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_HeroChest_C.LockedDescription.Des: Descriptive text shown when interacting while the chest is locked.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_HeroChest_C.Rank.Description: Determines the hologram that appears above the chest, as well as the loot the chest contains. From low to high, the ranks are C, B, A, and S.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_HeroChest_C.bUseDefaultLockedLabe: Determines whether to use the default locked label or override it. The default is "Rank X Chest" where X is the value of the Rank option. The default locked label is the main text shown when interacting while the chest is locked.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_HeroChest_C.Disable.Description: Disable the chest. While disabled, the chest can't be interacted with.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_HeroChest_C.LockForAllPlayers.Des: If the chest is closed, lock it for all players and set its default state to Locked.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_HeroChest_C.UnlockForAllPlayers.D: If the chest is closed, unlock it for all players and set its default state to Unlocked.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_HeroChest_C.LockForInstigator.Des: Lock the chest for the instigator.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_HeroChest_C.LockedLabel.Descripti: Main text shown when interacting while the chest is locked.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_HeroChest_C.InteractText.Descript: Text shown when interacting while the chest is unlocked.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_HeroChest_C.UnlockForInstigator.D: Unlock the chest for the instigator.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_HeroChest_C.bStartLocked.Descript: Whether the chest starts locked for all players.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_HeroChest_C.bEnabledAtGameStart.D: Whether this device is enabled when the game starts. While disabled, the chest cannot be interacted with.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_HeroChest_C.bShowHologram.Descrip: Whether to show the rank hologram while the chest is closed.
